Authors: Murad D.F., Fernando E., More L A.W., Aulia R.C.
Title: Application engineer selection using simple additive weighting method approach
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Murad, D.F., BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fernando, E., Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; More L, A.W., BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Aulia, R.C., BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Technology has developed to be powerful tools to support the business processes of each organization. Integration of technology with business processes become a crucial part as evidence of whether the technology will be applied may run in conjunction with the organization's business. Collaboration built an organization with System Integrators as partners in supporting the process is important, because the system Integrator with a portfolio that they must provide solutions and strategies to look at the needs of the organization to minimize the problems that result in business processes that are running on the organization. Qualified human resources is a key from System Integrator providing best services to the organization. Using the Simple Additive Weighting (SAW) method this study aims to build an engineer selection information system. Adopting the concept of a decision-making system, this system proved to be far more effective in selecting engineers according to established criteria. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Decision support system; Engineer selection; Simple additive weighting
Index Keywords: Additives; Decision making; Information management; Business Process; Decision-making systems; Simple additive weighting; System integrators; Engineers
